snippet: The improvement was expected to be temporary because of the euro zone’s debt crisis and recent negative data on the United States economy.
abstract: Stocks rise after recovering some ground from previous week's sell-off, as data shows that the nation's services sector improved in May and outweighed investor worries about the euro zone's fiscal crisis.
lead_paragraph: The improvement was expected to be temporary because of the euro zone’s debt crisis and recent negative data on the United States economy.

headline.seo: Financial Sector Leads Stock Market Rebound
headline.main: The Financial Sector Leads a Market Rebound
headline.print_headline: The Financial Sector Leads a Market Rebound
